scripts.gen-mainnet-v1: mustache config/mainnet-v1.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && yarn gen
scripts.gen-goerli: mustache config/goerli.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && yarn gen
scripts.gen-opgoerli: mustache config/opgoerli.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && yarn gen
scripts.gen-gnosis: mustache config/gnosis.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && yarn gen
scripts.deploy-goerli: yarn gen-goerli && graph deploy --product hosted-service andreimvp/poh-goerli
scripts.deploy-opgoerli: yarn gen-opgoerli && graph deploy --product hosted-service andreimvp/poh-opgoerli
scripts.deploy-gnosis: yarn gen-gnosis && graph deploy --product hosted-service andreimvp/poh-gnosis
scripts.deploy-mainnet-v1: yarn gen-mainnet-v1 && graph deploy --product hosted-service andreimvp/poh-v1-in-v2-shoes
